kinky.T.android:title: Blur Media
kinky.T.android:summary: media received in public groups will be blurred

kinky.T.android:title: Public Group Dms
kinky.T.android:summary: in chat info of public groups you can disable people being able to dm you

kinky.T.android:title: Admin Badges
kinky.T.android:summary: when enabled admins will receive badges in group chats

kinky.T.android:title: Public Group Notifications
kinky.T.android:summary: changes how you can mute public groups in chat info

kinky.T.android:title: Fake Camera
kinky.T.android:summary: gallery pictures will send as live pictures

kinky.T.android:title: Do Not Disturb
kinky.T.android:summary: automatically leave groups you were added to

kinky.List.android:title: Notification Icon Changer
kinky.List.android:summary: the change will take place when you get a new kik notification

kinky.T.android:title: Disable Typing
kinky.T.android:summary: disables other users from seeing when you type

kinky.T.android:title: Enable Gif Favorites
kinky.T.android:summary: allows you to store gifs you like

kinky.T.android:title: Enable Multi Photos
kinky.T.android:summary: allows you to send up to 5 pics or vids at once

kinky.T.android:title: Enable Bios
kinky.T.android:summary: set your bio in settings and view other users in chat info
